entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of thunderstorms early this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low plus 2 except minus 3 in low lying areas.
